Container.Name: free-games-claimer
Container.Overview:
FreeGamesClaimer is a program that will allow you to retrieve your free games and add them to your library from different platforms such as:
EpicGames GOG Amazon Gaming Microsoft (coming soon)
If you only want to use specific store and not all, you can add this in you're post arguments:
bash -c "node epic-games.js; node gog.js; node amazon.js"
You can choose only one of them, or two of them, remember to separate each node with ";" and you're good to go !

Config.Name: Generic Email
Config.Description: Default email for all your applications

Config.Name: Generic Password
Config.Description: Default password for all your applications

Config.Name: Epic Games Mail
Config.Description: Epic Games email for login. Overrides EMAIL.

Config.Name: Epic Games Password
Config.Description: Epic Games password for login. Overrides PASSWORD.

Config.Name: Prime Gaming Mail
Config.Description: Prime Gaming email for login. Overrides EMAIL.

Config.Name: Prime Gaming Password
Config.Description: Prime Gaming password for login. Overrides PASSWORD.

Config.Name: GOG MAIL
Config.Description: GOG email for login. Overrides EMAIL.

Config.Name: GOG PASSWORD
Config.Description: GOG password for login. Overrides PASSWORD.

Container.Config: /mnt/user/appdata/fgc" Mode="rw" Description="Data path" Type="Path" Display="always" Required="true" Mask="false

Config.Name: Notification
Config.Description: Notification :https://github.com/caronc/apprise#productivity-based-notifications to make a configuration (based on apprise).

Config.Name: WEB UI SHOW
Config.Description: Show browser if 1. Default for Docker, not shown when running outside.
